name: de_book_scarpper
description: For our dataset we going to use JSON files following this structure below. Note: all object content should be in german language ## Book Object Structure ```bash { "title": "book title", "description":"long description of the book"; "author":["ich bin den Author","Author 2"], //as an array "review":"reviews", "imagesUrls":["cover image url","second image url"], "ISPN":"", "bookType":"Taschenbuch"||"Gebunden", "release":"05.05.2022", "category": ["fantasy"] "" } ```
